name: RiverPlane
description:
OBJECTIVE

1) Your objective is to get the green barrels to get fuel,

2) And score points shooting to enemy's planes.

CONTROLS

AD / Left Right arrows to move.

Left Mouse Button / Left control to shoot.

Made as a learning project following this great course:

https://academy.zenva.com/course/unity-2d-game-development-projects-plane-river/

Author: Yone Moreno Jimenez
